$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Michalis! ...Where ARE you?!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|Ugh! Enough! Go away!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_SpringFes22,Face|I will do no such thing! ...Have you
no shame? Causing a scene like
that in front of all those Heroes...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|We're at a festival! I'm allowed
to get excited.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_SpringFes22,Face|Not at the expense of everyone
else's enjoyment!$k$p...I'm afraid you give me no choice
but to keep my eye on you for the
remainder of our time here.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|What? Are you serious?!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_春祭リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_SpringFes22,Face|Come now. We're going this way!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|Let GO of me! You're the worst
brother ever!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|...Aw, she gets to spend the festival
with her brother!$k$pNo time to be jealous! I have to find
Michalis—then, problem solved.$k$p$Sbs150|
